EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.Intelligent.Services.N.G.N.18224.TBC.Email 2A
EmailTemplate.subject: Gigabit broadband: get the best to give the best
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Intelligent Access Services Plan, deploy and maintain the world’s best gigabit services
Take our expertise, automation and analytics and give your customers the best gigabit experience.
- Nokia Bell Labs <[[https://networks.nokia.com/intelligent-access/services#perfect]]> has the perfect modeling to make the perfect business case for your network upgrade.
- We have a factory approach for a first-time-right network build <[[https://networks.nokia.com/intelligent-access/services#perfect]]> – just ask Pete. - And get predictive analytics <[[https://pages.nokia.com/16121.predictive.care.LP.html]]> for smarter network care and the best possible customer experience. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
